author: johnkord
body:
- [x] Partially resolves issue #1590.
- [x] Code is [rebased](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/git/README.md#sync-your-local-repo) on `origin/master`.

Adding Linux DSC MOF Compilation tests, and adding the "libmi" and "PSDesiredStateConfiguration" dependencies which were recently added to the nuget feed.  Refer to the pull request of these nuget pkgs being added here: https://github.com/PowerShell/psl-windows-build/pull/23

comments.author: vors
comments.body: @johnkord failures in Travis CI on OS X looks legit https://travis-ci.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/jobs/46875932#L3708

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: I have updated #1590 to include 3 tasks. Once CI passes, I will sign off this change, so the first 2 tasks from #1590 can be checked.

title: DSC MOF Compilation for Linux
